RatingFrequencyPolicy.name: RatingFrequencyPolicy
RatingFrequencyPolicy.description: Represents the policy that defines the frequency at which rating is triggered for the ratable summary records.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Auto-generated identifier for the rating frequency policy record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

ProductId.description: ID of the product for which the rating policy is defined.

RatingDelayDuration.description: Duration of delay—in hours—post the billing period after which the rating is to be triggered.

RatingDelayDurationUnit.description: Specifies the unit for the specified rating delay duration. Available in API version 65.0 and later.

RatingPeriod.description: Period for which the usage of a product and usage resource combination are to be rated.

UsageResourceId.description: ID of the usage resource for which the rating policy is defined.
